attributes.action: A statement in the House of Commons on the future of the NHS post Brexit.
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-48525211  although this shows he has recinded his situation, clarity from the UK government is needed.
https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/brexit/9223014/donald-trump-state-visit-nhs-row/ - one of the original articles stating his belief.
attributes.background:
The NHS belongs to the people of the United Kingdom, and not the government thereof.  It is therefore not acceptable to allow a foreign power to decide it should be privatised.
The President of America seems to think in the way above.
The NHS is not for sale, which the UK goverment must state.
